Package index

All functions

geo_lookup
Geographic Lookup Data
ods_all_datasets()
List all datasets
ods_dataset()
Download a dataset
ods_find_higher_geographies()
Find all geographies that contain, a certain geography
ods_find_lower_geographies()
Find all geographies that contain, or are contained by, a certain geography
ods_get_csv()
Download a dataset csv
ods_metadata()
Return the metadata used by a dataset
ods_print_query()
Generate a SPARQL query to call on API
ods_schemes()
Return the schemes used by a dataset
ods_structure()
Return a list of the structure of a dataset
